name: Andrélon Special conditioner aloe repair
composition: INGREDIËNTEN: Aqua, Cetearyl Alcohol, Dimethicone, Stearamidopropyl Dimethylamine, Behentrimonium Chloride, Parfum, Gluconolactone, Trehalose, Sodium Sulfate, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice Powder (Aloë Vera), Persea Gratissima Oil (Avocado-olie), Lactic Acid, Dipropylene Glycol, Amodimethicone, Sodium Chloride, Glycerin, Disodium EDTA, Phenoxyethanol, Cetrimonium Chloride, PEG-7 Propylheptyl Ether, Magnesium Nitrate, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Methylisothiazolinone, Geraniol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Linalool.
